constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 149 (Thursday, September 15, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. WATERS:
H.R. 8833.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H7882]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

title: Making Communities Stronger through the Community Reinvestment Act
